title: Handling the inconsistency of systems of $\min\rightarrow$ fuzzy relational equations. (arXiv:2308.12385v1 [cs.AI])
abstract:
In this article, we study the inconsistency of systems of $\min-ightarrow$ fuzzy relational equations. We give analytical formulas for computing the Chebyshev distances $
abla = \inf_{d \in \mathcal{D}} \Vert  eta - d \Vert$ associated to systems of $\min-ightarrow$ fuzzy relational equations of the form $\Gamma \Box_{ightarrow}^{\min} x =  eta$, where $ightarrow$ is a residual implicator among the G"odel implication $ightarrow_G$, the Goguen implication $ightarrow_{GG}$ or Lukasiewicz's implication $ightarrow_L$ and $\mathcal{D}$ is the set of second members of consistent systems defined with the same matrix $\Gamma$. The main preliminary result that allows us to obtain these formulas is that the Chebyshev distance $
abla$ is the lower bound of the solutions of a vector inequality, whatever the residual implicator used. Finally, we show that, in the case of the $\min-ightarrow_{G}$ system, the Chebyshev distance $
abla$ may be an infimum, while it is always a min

translated_title: 处理$\min\rightarrow$模糊关系方程组的不一致性
translated_abstract:
本文研究了$\min-ightarrow$模糊关系方程组的不一致性。我们给出了计算与形式为$\Gamma \Box_{ightarrow}^{\min} x =  eta$的$\min-ightarrow$模糊关系方程组相关的Chebyshev距离$
abla = \inf_{d \in \mathcal{D}} \Vert  eta - d \Vert$的分析公式，其中$ightarrow$是G"odel蕴含、Goguen蕴含或Lukasiewicz蕴含之一，$\mathcal{D}$是通过相同矩阵$\Gamma$定义的一致方程组的第二成员的集合。允许我们得到这些公式的主要初步结果是，无论使用哪种残差蕴含，Chebyshev距离$
abla$都是一个向量不等式解的下界。最后，我们证明，在$\min-ightarrow_{G}$系统的情况下，Chebyshev距离$
abla$可能是一个下确界，而在任何情况下它都是一个最小值。
tldr: 本文研究了$\min-\rightarrow$模糊关系方程组的不一致性，并给出了计算与该方程组相关的Chebyshev距离的分析公式。最终证明，在某些情况下，该距离可能为下确界，而在任何情况下都为最小值。
